objective: Contribute as a software engineer by delivering reliable, scalable, and maintainable web applications leveraging strong frontend skills, clean code practices, and a collaborative mindset—to improve user experience, solve real‑world problems, and advance business goals through continuous learning and best practices.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.summary: Learn how to develop and deploy real-world projects and add value; learn performance optimization, SEO, how tests should be written; clean code, layered architecture, atomic design.

experience.title: Intern
experience.summary: Learned fundamentals of JavaScript; learned React and Next.js; made projects using CRUD operations.

experience.title: Summer Intern (15 days)
experience.summary: Worked with web development, backend programming, and database management.
